DOC.brief_summary: March 2013 March 2014 , Rhupus patient enrol receive 25-mg etanercept injection subcutaneously twice week . The follow-up time study 24 week .
DOC.detailed_description: March 2013 March 2014 , patient unresponsive therapy corticosteroid disease-modifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARDs ) , Disease Activity Score 28 Joints ( DAS28 ) > 5.1 enrolled receive 25-mg etanercept injection subcutaneously twice week . The follow-up time study 24 week .
DOC.criteria: Rhupus patient unresponsive therapy corticosteroid diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARDs ) , Disease Activity Score 28 Joints ( DAS28 ) > 5.1 participated study
